Volunteer - Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale Skip to content Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale INFORMATION ◆ EVENTS ◆ ADVOCACY Volunteer Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale is working diligently on numerous projects to raise funds for Riverwalk improvements and to create additional entertainment options for the community and visitors. The dedicated group of private citizens who make up the Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale is constantly seeking the continued support of merchants, government, businesses and local Fort Lauderdale and Broward County residents to help accomplish their goals. Contact info@goriverwalk.com for more information. For upcoming volunteer opportunities contact the Events Manager at (954)468-1541 ext. 204 or email events@goriverwalk.com . Riverwalk Burger Battle™ IX - Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale Skip to content Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale INFORMATION ◆ EVENTS ◆ ADVOCACY Riverwalk Burger Battle™ IX When Friday, March 23, 2018 7:00 pm - 10:00 pm Add To Calendar Download ICS Google Calendar iCalendar Office 365 Outlook Live Where Huizenga Plaza 32 East Las Olas Boulevard, Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33301 Event Type Cocktail Community Festival Food Fundraiser Riverwalk Front Page Riverwalk Happenings beer , burgers , competition , drinks , food , fries , fun , fundraiser , live music , outdoors , wine Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale’s BURGER BATTLE ™ IX returns to Huizenga Plaza on Friday, March 23, 2018! This sizzling event will pit top local restaurants and burger joints against one another as they show off their culinary creativity and grilling skills to 1200+ guests along the scenic New River. The afternoon will include a Burger Eating Contest, live music, cold beer, quality cocktails, refreshing wines and plenty of gourmet burger creations while raising funds to support the Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale’s mission of “ building and nurturing a vibrant community connected by the New River .” In addition to the unlimited burger tasting, all event goers will be treated to a French-Fry Bar . Each guest will receive three drink tickets for use at either the Jack Daniels cocktail stands & the Barefoot Wine & Bubbly tent provided by Breakthru Beverage and beer stations supplied by Stephens Distributing to wash down all of those burgers. Who will take the Trophy? A team of restaurant industry judges will award the custom Riverwalk Burger Battle™ trophy and guests will also select a Fan Favorite with their Burger Battle Chip. EAT ~ DRINK  ~ ROCK ~ VOTE $  45.  General Admission includes Burger Samples from all of the burger contest contenders, 3 Drink Tickets, French Fry Bar, live entertainment and a voting token to place your vote for the “Fan Favorite.” $125.  VIP Admission ~ a one of a kind VIP burger experience : VIP admission for 1, INCLUDES: early admission to the event at 6:30pm, unlimited burger samples from all burger contest contenders, open bar and beer tastings, French fry bar; specialty VIP bites only available in the VIP area, specialty tables and seating, live entertainment and a voting token to place your vote for the “Fan Favorite.” $1250. Slider Sponsor ~ INCLUDES – VIP admission for you and 9 of your closest friends, co-workers or clients; early admission to the event at 6:30pm, unlimited burger samples from all burger contest contenders, open bar and beer tastings, French fry bar; specialty VIP bites only available in the VIP area, live entertainment, a voting token for each of your guests to vote for the “Fan Favorite,” sponsor logo on webpage; space allocated to hang a banner at the event; table signage with your company or group’s name on your reserved table. For more information or sponsorship opportunities contact Karly Young at 954-468-1541ext.208| Karly@GoRiverwalk.com Riverwalk would like to that all of our sponsors and partners for your continued support and making this wonderfully delicious competition possible: Bokampers , ROK:BRGR , Tucker Duke’s , Metro Diner , BRGR Stop , Burger Craze , Hard Rock Cafe , Pelican Grand , Pincho Factory , JWB , Gulfstream Park JM Lexus , PMG (Property Markets Group) , Jack Daniels , Barefoot Wine & Bubbly , Breakthru Beverage, VOSS , Stephens Distributing , Budweiser , Big Mouth Girlz , The Media Lab , Eye on South Florida , Two Men & A Truck , Best Rental Service , The Original Signman , BB&T , Midgard Managment , Ellis Connects , Dynamix , Go Riverwalk , Palm Beach Happening , Sunbelt Rentals , Stevens & Goldwyn, PA , The Downtowner , Mangos Burger Battle VIII video from The Media Lab Burger Battle XI March 23, 2018 7:00 – 10:00pm Huizenga Plaza Facebook Mailing List Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Instagram Home Riverwalk About Us Board/Staff Riverwalk District Parks 9/11 Monument Get Involved Become a Member Volunteer Membership Members Login Donate to Riverwalk Partners & Sponsors Sponsor/Partner Opportunities Fort Lauderdale Links Events Greater Fort Lauderdale Event Calendar Riverwalk Happenings Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale Signature Events Riverwalk Tribute Positively Pink Downtown Parking and Transportation Go Riverwalk Magazine Issues Exclusives SNAPPED@ Media Kit & Ad Rates Media Inquiries Bricks & Banners Order a Brick Sponsor a Banner Riverwalk Recreation Videos Contact Us Riverwalk Team Magazine Team Home | Riverwalk | Events | Membership | Bricks & Banners | Partners & Sponsors | GoRiverwalk Magazine | Contact Us Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale Copyright © 2025 | All rights reserved | Web Machines by Q Branch .

Events - Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale Skip to content Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale INFORMATION ◆ EVENTS ◆ ADVOCACY Events Greater Fort Lauderdale Event Calendar Riverwalk Signature Events Downtown Parking and Transportation Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale , along with our charity, city, county and business partners, is pleased to provide a Greater Fort Lauderdale Event Calendar to assist in planning your local entertainment. Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale is the preeminent organization engaged in promoting Fort Lauderdale’s Downtown and the Riverwalk Park as a place to live, work and play. We provide this mission through organizing and hosting a wide range of fundraising events and other activations. We are pleased to partner with other organizations to promote and activate Riverwalk, Downtown and Greater Fort Lauderdale. Greater Fort Lauderdale Event Calendar – Event Submissions This calendar is for events (lasting one to several days, not on-going presentations or exhibits) occurring in Greater Fort Lauderdale, with other Broward County events evaluated on a case-by-case basis. The event form must be completed in its entirety for approval Submission Requirements Your name/email – Required so the Riverwalk Team can contact you for more information; this is not included in your event posting. Required image – For best appearance, crop your images into a square with a minimum of 200 pixels/maximum 700 pixels per side and maximum file size of 200kb.  Accepted file formats are: .gif, .jpg, .jpeg and .png. Web addresses – MUST begin with “https://” Phone numbers – preferred but not required. Before submitting your event, please search the calendar to make sure that your event is not already posted. The Riverwalk Team will post some events to the calendar. Submissions will be posted following review You will receive email confirmation after your event is approved, please allow minimum of 2 business days for approval. Incomplete submissions will be delayed as our staff reaches out to you, and may be denied. If you have any questions, please reach out to the Calendar Manager . Your Details Name Email Event Name The event name. Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale | LinkedIn Skip to main content LinkedIn Top Content People Learning Jobs Games Sign in Join now Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale Non-profit Organizations Fort Lauderdale, Florida 1,139 followers Building and nurturing Riverwalk and the Riverwalk District as a vibrant community connected by the New River. Follow View all 22 employees Report this company About us Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization responsible for the planning, programming, and promotion of the Riverwalk District.  We pursue our mission, “to be the catalyst in building and nurturing Riverwalk and the Riverwalk District as a vibrant community connected by the New River”, through a range of fundraising, events and advocacy, and by providing valuable information through our website, Go Riverwalk Magazine and social media.

Riverwalk produces annual signature events such as the Stone Crab and Seafood Festival, Burger Battle™, and Chili Cookoff that draw tens of thousands of people to the City of Fort Lauderdale’s downtown, as well as the annual Riverwalk Tribute that honors a member of the community for their exceptional accomplishments.  The Riverwalk Signature Brick program has seen 40,000+ etched bricks placed along the 2.5 mile Riverwalk Park, and the Riverwalk Banners program highlights corporate and individual support of Riverwalk to the District’s 1.5 million annual visitors.

Since 2003 Riverwalk has produced the official Fort Lauderdale city magazine, Go Riverwalk Magazine, with twelve annual issues aimed at business and community leaders, residents and visitors alike.  Riverwalk has seven social media accounts, weekly e-blasts to Riverwalk and community members, and an active website that hosts the Greater Fort Lauderdale Events Calendar, which highlights events both in downtown Fort Lauderdale and throughout Broward County.

Riverwalk is the primary advocate for the improvement and activation of the Riverwalk Park and the ten additional City of Fort Lauderdale Parks in the Riverwalk District.  Riverwalk has been responsible for the many art installations and public exercise stations along the Riverwalk, as well as advocating to establish the free Riverwalk Water Trolley.  Most recently, Riverwalk completed the 9/11 Memorial, displaying a segment of the PATH rail tracks taken from the wreckage of the World Trade Center. Boats Privacy Policy Ticket Policy Terms and Conditions The Winterfest Foundation 93 Days Away 12.13.25 Board and Advisory Members Winterfest, Inc. announced its Chairman of the Board, Board, and Advisory Members. “The 2023-2024 Winterfest Board is excited to begin a new era as we celebrate our 52 nd Anniversary,” said Lisa Scott-Founds, Winterfest President & CEO. “We are always striving to be bigger and better year after year, and our board is committed now more than ever to bring the community the ‘Best Show on H2O’.” The Winterfest board of directors and advisors are composed of community leaders who are ambassadors for this South Florida signature event. Look in our Gallery for photos of the Board Installation at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino and annual retreats at various locations. Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale Signature Events - Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale Skip to content Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale INFORMATION ◆ EVENTS ◆ ADVOCACY Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale Signature Events Riverwalk has our own series of events that celebrate the Riverwalk District as a treasured place to Live, Work & Play.  Most of Riverwalk’s events are free and open to the public and held in Downtown Riverwalk District parks. The below list is not inclusive of all Riverwalk and/or partnered events. *Date tentatively scheduled. 9th Annual Riverwalk Fall Festival Saturday, October 18, 2025 • 12 pm – 4 pm Esplanade Park Downtown Day of the Dead Saturday, November 1, 2025 •  3 pm – 11 pm Esplanade Park/Riverwalk/SW 3rd Ave Light Up Lauderdale (Get Lit) Thursday, November 6, 2025 • 5:30 pm – 8:30 pm Esplanade Park 5th Annual Riverwalk International Food Festival (RIFF) Saturday, November 15, 2025 • 12 pm – 4 pm Esplanade Park Ellis Connects Riverwalk Holiday Lights Cruise Monday, December 8, 2025 • 5 pm – 7 pm Laura Ward Riverwalk Plaza 16th Annual Riverwalk Stone Crab & Seafood Festival Saturday, January 3, 2026 • 11 am – 4 pm Esplanade Park 10th Annual Riverwalk Chili Cook-off Saturday, February 21, 2026 • 12 pm – 4 pm Esplanade Park 19th Annual Riverwalk Mutts & Martinis TM Saturday, March 21, 2026 • Time TBD Esplanade Park Smoke on the Water BBQ Feast Saturday, May 16, 2026 • Time TBD Esplanade Park 4th Annual Riverwalk Tacos & Tequila Festival Saturday, July 18, 2026 • Time TBD Esplanade Park Riverwalk Burger Battle TM – September 2026* 2026 will mark the return of the original South Florida Burger Battle, Riverwalk Burger Battle TM ! Burger Battle is an opportunity for area restaurants to pull out all the stops and win bragging rights for the year.  A panel of judges will judge the entrants on a series of criteria, while attendees sample the burgers and select the “Fan Favorite”. Burger Battle is a ticketed event with annual attendance of 400-800 with a VIP experience available. Riverwalk Tribute – 2026 Date TBD Riverwalk’s premier annual event, Riverwalk Tribute, honors community members that have made a significant contribution to Riverwalk and the City of Fort Lauderdale.  In an evening reception, Riverwalk members, community leaders and guests celebrate these leaders in our community. The 25th Annual Riverwalk Tribute was held on Thursday, May 1, 2025 at the Riverside Hotel on Las Olas Blvd and honored: Lisa Lutoff-Perlo, Melissa Milroy, Ed Smoker and Dean J. Trantalis, Esq. Past honorees include: Jim Ellis – Ellis Diversified Kelley Shanley – Broward Center for the Performing Arts Mike Jackson – AutoNation Jorge Perez – The Related Group Beverly Raphael Altman – RCC Associates Crush Law – Courtney and Jason Crush Bob Swindell – Greater Fort Lauderdale Alliance Riverwalk Tribute is a ticketed event held at a local venue.  Tickets are included for some Riverwalk membership levels, and with all sponsorships. Annual attendance of 300-500 Riverwalk members and philanthropists as well as business, civic and government leaders. Click here for more information on the Riverwalk Tribute. Additional events Riverwalk Member Events – Get Downtown and Power Mixers Riverwalk holds a number of events annually for members to connect and celebrate the Riverwalk.  Get Downtown is held twice a year for the general membership in the spring and fall, while Power Mixers for Trustee members and above happen quarterly. Riverwalk Rhythm & Brews – Quarterly Held quarterly, Rhythm & Brews is a live music event, with cold brews from South Florida breweries, lawn games and amazing local food trucks!  All proceeds from this series directly benefit Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale, including all alcohol sales. Rhythm & Brews regularly attracts between 1,500 and 3,000 attendees for a relaxed evening or afternoon in the Park.  Riverwalk Rhythm & Brews will be scheduled based on sponsors secured and partnerships with local breweries or other partners. Other Events Riverwalk holds additional events of our own, and partners with other organizations to build and support additional events. Contact The Events Team For information on Riverwalk’s events, including vendor and sponsor opportunities, and any other events information, please email events@GoRiverwalk.com or call (954) 468-1541.
